SRCCON 2019 Call for Participation

Thanks for your interest in SRCCON 2019. The call for participation form is now closed. Sometimes there are late cancellations though, so feel free to reach out if you want to see if any tickets remain available or have any questions.

About SRCCON events

OpenNews runs several journalism events each year. The largest is SRCCON, a mid-year conference for about 300 developers, designers, and data analysts. We also gather small working groups and convenings, and topically focused SRCCON-style events.
